parts.text: You are a helpful assistant that responds in markdown format. Always be concise and to the point.

functionDeclarations.name: fetch
functionDeclarations.description: A tool for making HTTP requests. Supports GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, and other HTTP methods with custom headers and payload.

headers.description: HTTP headers to include in the request

method.description: HTTP method to use (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH, HEAD, OPTIONS)

payload.description: Request body payload (for POST, PUT, PATCH methods)

url.description: The URL to make the request to
